contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quiestède |region = [[Image:Blason Nord-Pas-De-Calais.svg|20px]] [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] |department = [[Image:Pas de Calais Arms.svg|20px]] [[Pas-de-Calais]] |arrondissement = [[arrondissement of Saint-Omer|Saint-Omer]] |canton = Aire-sur-la-Lys |INSEE = 62681 |postal code = 62120 |mayor = Hervé Floret |term = 2001–2008 |intercommunality = Pays d'Aire |longitude = 2.3186 |latitude = 50.68 |elevation m = 37 |elevation min m = 23 |elevation max m = 60 |area km2 = 2.83 |population = 681 |population date = 2006 }} '''Quiestède''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Pas-de-Calais]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] region of [[France]]. ==Geography== Quiestède lies about 6 miles (9 km) south of [[Saint-Omer]], at the junction of the D201 and D195 roads. ==Population== {| align="center" rules="all" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4" style="border: 1px solid #999; border-right: 2px solid #999; border-bottom:2px solid #999; background: #f3fff3" |+ style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em"|Population history |-style="background: #ddffdd" ! 1962 !! 1968 !! 1975 !! 1982 !! 1990 !! 1999 !! 2006 |- | align=center| 271 || align=center| 303 || align=center| 291 || align=center| 402 || align=center| 537 || align=center| 665 || align=center| 681 |- | colspan=7 align=center| <small>Census count starting from 1962: Population without duplicates</small> |} ==Places of interest== * The church of Notre-Dame, dating from the sixteenth century. * The Château de Laprée, built in 1760. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department]] ==References== * [http://www.insee.fr/fr/methodes/nomenclatures/cog/fichecommunale.asp?codedep=62&codecom=681 INSEE commune file] {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://perso.orange.fr/quiestede/ Quiestède Table Tennis club website] {{Fr}} * [http://www.quid.fr/communes.html?mode=detail&id=27168&req=Quiestède Quiestède on the Quid website] {{Fr}} {{Pas-de-Calais communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quiestede}} [[Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais]] {{PasdeCalais-geo-stub}}
